website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular pepper spray bottle provides the utmost security in almost any situation.
pros: Formula includes UV marking dye to help identify suspect
cons: Many customers wish the product had a longer range

customer_reviews.title: Works inconsistently
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these, optimist that I am. Sometimes it works. Sometimes the spray just dribbles out on your hand instead of spraying as an aerosol. Sometimes nothing comes out at all. Given its inconsistent performance, I wouldn't rely on it. Since the attacker will likely just laugh at you, I suggest that the manufacturer make a little scroll with the word "Boo" come out of the nozzle. That way, by causing enough laughter, you might get away and not even have to clean pepper spray off your hand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Hurts Real Bad.
customer_reviews.text: They say the NYC police use this brand and it is no wonder why. I got this for my love-muffin, Darleen. I sprayed myself in the face with this just to see before I gave it to my girl and it hurt hella bad. I reckon I wouldn't recommend spraying yourself with it. I've been sprayed with at least 4 or 5 types of mace in my life and this one is by far the worst. My eyes was runnin' and I felt like I couldn't breathe. Luckily my boy Donny was lookin' out with the hose near by but it still took me like 10 minutes before I could open my eyes for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Duda

customer_reviews.title: One Blind Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe that these are the times that we live in to make carrying something like this a NECESSITY. I have this on a wrist lanyard with my whistle, personal alarm and small tactical flashlight that I carry with me whenever I leave my home. I keep this totally separate from my keys just in case I run into a really bad person, it gives me a little peace of mind along with my retractable baton that I keep in my purse. I pray that I never have to use this. I have watched the video which gives good advice for dos and don'ts and have practiced holding this in my hand, which is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sweettreat

customer_reviews.title: Accidentally sprayed!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. The way its made with a movable top button is horrible. I always find it turned in the spray position and have to keep turning it to the safe mode. Accidentally, it went off one day in my purse and I kept smelling something really bad but couldn't place my finger on it. PLEASE fix this flaw sabre! Otherwise it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SNK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste you money less than 2 month later you will be upset SEE VIDEO
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase I have had this pepper spray about 2 months now never used only the 1 time I tested, so yesterday was the time I actually needed it when a man followed me out of Walmart and when I tried to spray it nothing came out! So I said that to say don’t spend your money on it just because it’s cute and fancy! Get the regular pepper spray can instead! But these are a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPHINE

customer_reviews.title: Great size but....
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and exactly as described. Item small enough to fit into palm of hand. Only complaint is the 'on/off' switch is very loose (on both) and every time I look it's in the 'on' position. I'm afraid I'll accidentally discharge it!! Wish it would stay in the locked position.
customer_reviews.author: busymomof3

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to keep this on my keychain, as intended, but it is WAY easy for someone to "quick release" this. I have twin toddlers and one of the things i was concerned about is absolutely the case here. I would never trust my kids if they accidentally got a hold of my keys, which happens often. The last thing I need is a maced kid. I dont like it for that reason alone. It shouldnt be hard, but it shouldnt be that I brush up against something and it releases. No thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SaraBean

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tested it on myself. Works very well when sprayed across the face in a z pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Pingu

customer_reviews.title: Pee-you!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and put it in my purse, then started noticing a dead skunk smell or something just as bad. The lever was all the way off, but this thing still kept stinking up my purse and surrounding area. I had to throw it out. It was embarrassing walking around smelling like that. I'll look for a different brand. I may have to replace my purse too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: The packing was not great but the actual pepper spray itself is very potent
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again because of the packaging. The level to unlock and lock was faulty. It actually would always unlock. Afraid it was going to damage the inside of my purse, eventually the whole container broke. Once the pepper spray actually came out a little bit and I cleaned the tip with a paper towel. I didn't wash my hands and I accidentally scratch my temples and it really started to sting, even though I didn't really get any pepper spray on my hands. The packing was not great but the actual pepper spray itself is very potent.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Do not use/try it at home. This is not for fun. It is very strong and it may make you cough for hours.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister because she is very harassed when she is walking on the street. Sometimes guys stops her and they say or do uncomfortable things and that makes her insecure. she always have it in her bag it makes her have a bit of security. she already made a report at the police station but they laughed at her face and said she has no proof. Learning self-defense takes time and money so having one of these helps you have more confidence. She still has not used it on anyone and hopes not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Vitor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and fit for my purse...
customer_reviews.text: I work in an environment that has wonderful security, but they also realize they can't always protect us from the evil that hides outdoors. This spray is the perfect size for my purse, and the legal size for me to carry onto property and not be forced to leave in my car. It gives me the feeling of security I need. I also carry a small canister when I walk my dog, mainly to protect us from larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Athena B.

customer_reviews.title: Small and handy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for only a couple days and hope to never have to use it but I had to buy since the plaza where I work at closes all it’s stores hours earlier than my work place and going from my work place to the dumpster and then to my car at night makes it uncomfortable for me so I wanted some kind of safety unit at hand! This item is small and compact easy to put on your keychain, I have been worried about the lock switch unlocking on its own but I figure as long as I am carefully placing it down into my bag it should be okay! It’s great for the price anyways
customer_reviews.author: ZM

customer_reviews.title: Important to have handy.
customer_reviews.text: I've given these to all female members in my family who carry them on nights out or even in lonely parking garages. No one wants to feel vulnerable and at least with this walking the dog in the evening can be enjoyable again. I have purchased them locally for decades but found them online. Same product, lower price. Happily, I bought 3 sets of 2. This brand I found after some of the others. I think this one seems to fit the bill best. Hand sized, powerful, easy access with a simple latch for safety. Would recommend highly and would definitely buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: fattymoko

customer_reviews.title: Safety Mase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, it comes with instructions and an link explaining how to properly use this mase. There is a safety on it so It's great for your daughter going off to college, your sister, your wife, your husband, or really just anyone who want's peice of mind walking down the road or alone in a parking garage. Even though it's pink this is no fashion excessory, I'd reccomend it unless you've taken jujitsu or a self desenfe class and you know how to defend yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: was missing the quick release ring, so not able to keep it readily accessible
customer_reviews.author: G. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I have not yet had to use this pepper spray on another person. I did test spray and it definitely does work. I keep it on my car keys and it feels very secure there. There is no worry of it accidentally spraying in your purse because the the part you push does not move easily unless you physically do it. I hope that I never have to use this on another person but it does make me feel protected and keep me extra alert at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Tom k

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I haven't needed to use it in self-defense yet, but I did test it out. I made sure to do that outdoors and away from my face, but even with those precautions, I could still sense how effective this would be up close. Plus, the safety is easy to disengage, but not too easy to the point of becoming a hazard. The craftsmanship is great. I'm very satisfied with my purchase, and I absolutely love the hot-pink option.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold, stays locked
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky on my keychain, but that's what makes the pepper spray easy to hold. I love the bright pink color. I have tested it and shoots straight and far. Other pepper sprays I've had have had issues staying locked and ended up squirting out in my purse. This particular one does not do that. So I'm very happy not to have a mess on my hands or accidentally touch pepper spray. It does come with a sloth small latch that you can easily remove it from your keychain. That's helpful because I may not always bring my whole keychain with me. I definitely recommend this pepper spray for anyone who wants to feel safer.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Hill Reader

customer_reviews.title: Insurance for walking/light hiking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a purchase you hope you never have to use. I have some walking buddies who trek the semi-wooded areas in the regional parks but we can't always meet up, so I usually don't go alone. The crime rate is low but still not a great idea -- not only for people but the occasional 'testy' critter...avoidance is best but not always possible. I was also glad for the 2-pack, I shared with a friend. Side benefit: I can now find my car keys! They stay attached to the bright pink cylinder, ha! The cylinder is a bit bulky but not heavy....fits easily in most pockets.
customer_reviews.author: dobltrobl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: Needed protection. 😲 wow VERY STRONG.No matter what sex you are this is a must have. I love it sprays straight out. At least 6 feet. Easy to use. I guarantee if you spray your attacker anywhere on face they will leave you the heck alone. The pepper in it lingers in the air. I love it!! I feel safer with this. I purchased 2 each fir my entire family. One attached to keys and wallet. Oh yes I love the extra easy removal key chain attachment. Spray is not heavy at all. Feels a little bulky but that’s ok. That’s too big expected. Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R Y

customer_reviews.title: Older than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in a two pack to have one for my wife and one for my mother in law, the listing said that they have a four year shelf life but the package I received expires less than three years from the date of receipt. I can't comment on use, etc. but it is disappointing to receive it with 25% of the usable lifespan already expired.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Police Pepper Spray
customer_reviews.text: Great spray....GF carries it and has to use it once cause a hobo approached her demanding money and grabbed her arm. GF said hold on I'll give you a dollar, she reached in her purse and sprayed the hobo in the eyes. She was able to get in her car and drive away as the hobo just stood there with his eyes closed screaming it hurt. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a small/medium woman and my city has had a huge rise in crime lately. I feel much safer with this. I like the quick release feature from my keychain. I like the finger grips. I wish the safety was a little bit more secure, but I think i'm just paranoid that it will leak into my purse. I shot it at point blank about half an inch into my grass just for a second to test it and it worked. The spray is bright red. Recommend to anyone wanting extra peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Gives me piece of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my pepper spray and praying I never have to use it. But as a daily bus transit rider in the early mornings, having this on hand gives me a sense of security & protection. I spray tested it in the AIR(away from myself and others) it has a strong pepper scent once sprayed, makes it hard to breathe, so I can’t imagine what it would do to someone’s eyes if sprayed. It also has a detaching and locking mechanism. I would recommend anyone to buy it for themselves or as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Zobaria

customer_reviews.title: I used this particular one to test the spray outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this particular one to test the spray outside, and I barely got 2-3 sprays from it before it stopped working (or was empty?). It did not shoot as far as it claimed either. Looking for a new one, now that mine has reached the expiration date. Maybe it does not work reliably once it expired? Who knows, but I can't believe I actually used to feel safe carrying this. I would not buy this particular one again.
customer_reviews.author: HummingbirdsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Very Loose "Locking" Mechanism
customer_reviews.text: This pepper spray does not have a very secure safety lock. The "lock" slides way too easily out of position. I am not at all comfortable letting my daughter keep this in her purse. It would be way too easy to spray it accidentally. Had really hoped for one that would have a very secure lock/safety mechanism. This isn't that.
customer_reviews.author: TL Rice

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle pepper spray
customer_reviews.text: Got a two pack for me and my wife. The bright color is helpful. You always know where it is and people are weary to come too close. I had to use it recently and it hit the target from 10+ feet away. I do recommend covering you mouth and nose in case there’s blowback from wind. I coughed a bit as it got in my mouth. And so test shots so you know how to use it. Best to spray sideways in bursts then hold down the nozzle (can be less effective and more wasteful).
customer_reviews.author: Doughless

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY.  WILL NOT STAY LOCKED AND YOU CAN NOT RETURN ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken heed to the reviewers who stated that they had leaks and accidental discharges. The groove to keep the sprayer locked is too small so it's bound to come unlocked and accidentally discharge too easily. Wasted $11 dollars because this item is in a non-returnable class, which of course is never clearly posted, and more importantly I ordered for my daughters' safety and would not give them this accident waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Betty S. Reeder

customer_reviews.title: A must have for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up giving this to my sister, as she walks to the CU campus in Downtown Denver. She told me a story of a man in a van who followed her for several blocks, then engaged in conversation with her, tried to give her a ride then got angry when she said no. This is a must have for any woman or man. Always be aware of what and who is around you. Don't text and walk busy streets or listen to music. Be careful, having this in your hand helps.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyK

customer_reviews.title: Straight Precise Shot
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these on any humans... but as soon as I got them I tested them in the grass to ensure they worked properly. They sprayed very skinny straight lines and shot MANY feet out. If I ever needed to use these for self-defense, I feel like the target would be accurately reached with the precise pepper spray shot.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Hooked onto my purse handle
customer_reviews.text: I liike the style of the Sabre pepper spray device. Good locking device but can see I could open it without even looking. Hope I never have to use it. Ordered 3.....1 for each granddaughter and will likely reorder for myself once I give these 3 away.
customer_reviews.author: Sandijadams

customer_reviews.title: Police quality, but the gel form is better to have
customer_reviews.text: My ex husband was a cop, and this is the brand they use. I feel most comfortable with this brand. Thankfully I’ve never had to use it, however, knowing what it does to people, I would highly recommend. Only thing is if you can find this in the gel, that’s better than the spray. It helps you aim better and is more effective
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for any college student!
customer_reviews.text: As a young college student I bought this after many nights feeling afraid for my safety off campus or walking to my car from work. I don’t feel so afraid anymore, now that I have this pepper spray. After having tested it once as practice I found it to be very easy to unlock, hold, and use. I LOVE the pink color. Not just because I love pink, but because of how bright and visible it is. Now, whilst walking alone at night, I hold this in my hand or on my car keys so it can catch the eye of any potential attackers. You can’t miss it from a hundred feet away!
customer_reviews.author: Hunnybunny

customer_reviews.title: Bought 5 for my entire family -- one of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 for my entire family -- one of my sister's and mine fell off our keychains. Both my parents' leaked so they never got a chance to use it. only my little sister still has hers. Bought them around a month ago. They are strong, but what's the point of being strong if they're going to leak and fall off before you even get the chance to use them?
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Seo

customer_reviews.title: I feel safer having this
customer_reviews.text: I love this I feel so much safer having It and having my teenage daughter have one too when she is out and about it’s good to know she has this to defend herself if needed. I wish it was smaller though it is on my keychain but it’s kind of big in my opinion. And I like that it has a quick release because she has to take it off her keychain to walk into school
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: A woman's personal defense
customer_reviews.text: I buy these in bulk, and give to the young women attached to my congregation when they're going off to college, along with the personal alarm. The world just isn't quite what it used to be... The families are always pleased their daughters have something to take along to school. My niece tested hers once, sprayed her hand, regretted it. Can imagine the effect it has on a face.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Locking feature easily unlocks.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the canister is concealed inside the case to prevent accidentally puncturing. I previously had one that didn't have a protective case around it and have it in my purse started to dent the canister over time. But the locking feature to prevent accidental discharge isn't the best. I often take it out if my bag and find it in the position ready to spray.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Test the sprayer as soon as it arrives!
customer_reviews.text: Got in a situation to where I had to use the spray. Not until then did I find out that the spray comes out literally like a spray from a water bottle. Almost like a mist! I know its called a "spray" but in dangerous moments you need a stream when your attacker is coming towards you!! Plus, the latch that holds the spray on my keys keeps coming undone. I've lost this spray so many times!! At this point the only protection is the mere sight of the pepper spray.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Items appears to be as described. Pack of two with rings to attach to purse, keys, etc.. I sprayed one to test it out. Seems to project really well. As far as heat, I wouldn’t know. Lol of course I hope I wouldn’t have to use it, but it’s great to have just for peace of mind. Small and compact, can fit in the palm of your hand, in a pocket, and a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in lock feature and can’t return
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a model that wouldn’t discharge accidentally and hoped this unit had a good lock feature. It doesn’t. With very little effort the top spins into place and than an accident push will set it off. We can’t return it and we didn’t know this either at the time of purchase. Do we toss it in the trash or use it with the risk that the pepper spray may discharge accidentally. We suggest you look for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Ashman

customer_reviews.title: Really good, better safe than sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Since I've started college, I've been feeling a little nervous walking home from my night class. I'm just a tiny Asian girl who never made it past a white belt in karate so I bought this to give myself a little peace of mind. They are great gifts too; I've ordered two packs of these already and I plan on ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: SkyTan

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT Work, AT ALL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a two pack in August 2016. Gave one to my daughter and I kept one. Last Friday the neighbor’s German Shepard (mutt) jumped the fence and ran up on me and our miniature schnauzer. I sprayed, and sprayed, and sprayed, and emptied the bottle. Luckily the dog did not become aggressive, but the spray did not work AT ALL!!! I've been advised to purchase bear spray!!!
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Better than a gun!  For me at least, whew, thanks pink pepper sprayer of doom!!!  Read on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for her because she doesn't like firearms... Well, in hindsight I'm glad, because when she got really mad and sprayed me in the face (to prove the awesome product really works of course) I was very glad that she wasn't a staunch advocate of the 2nd amendment. Now I need to buy her another one, I better be nicer in the future.
customer_reviews.author: biohazmat76

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, almost too easy
customer_reviews.text: While showing my girlfriend the ease of use of this product the locking mechanism stuck slightly and caused it to fire (into the sink thankfully) but our eyes were definitely watered up because of it. I'd go more for operator error as she had no issues using it (must be my big clumsy hands) but definitely an effective deterrent tool. Do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Wish the “lock” wasn’t so loose
customer_reviews.text: The switch to be able to press down and engage the spray is WAY to easy to move. Like if I tilt it on it’s side it would move most of the way over. It would be FAR too easy to accidentally spray this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I keep it on my keychain everywhere I go, thankfully haven’t used it and hope I never do but I love it and i carry it in my hand when I walk alone. It’s bright too so if anyone sees it they know what it is and I think that deters them in itself by seeing you have pepper spray ready. Twice I have thrown it in my bag and when got it out the lock thing was turned a little so it wasn’t completely locked but that probably because it got shoved around a lot in my backpack, not common occurrence and even if it did happen you still have to make an effort to push To spray.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Conley

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always afraid the lock will detach and go off in my bag because it’s such a gentle locking mechanism, but the product is great. This is my second time buying it. I test it as suggested, and have had no issues. Thankfully, haven’t had to use it on anyone, but I feel 100% safer knowing I have it in case.
customer_reviews.author: Rfox8

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it. The top is cheaply made and isn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: The switch on the top that you move in case you want to use it is actually lose. My wife caries it in her purse and sometimes, the little switch moves on it’s own and has a few times, pushed down on the top, releasing the spray. I would not recommend it. The top is cheaply made and isn’t so safe to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar E

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought seven sets of these for all the ladies in my life. Great gift idea and cost effective, since there were two to a set. I made copies of the insert and rolled each spray separately. It looked like one of those surprise confetti gifts you can give for Christmas. Well received by all.
customer_reviews.author: Villaftc

customer_reviews.title: leaky pepper spray
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when all of a sudden it poured out of my little spray nozzle that was on my keychain. All of it came out at once and splashed on my clothes and in my purse and I didn't know what it was until I touched my eye and thought I was going to go blind. That's extremely dangerous. My fingers still burn and I've washed them over and over and over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice large size. I like the keychain!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value to help protect me and my daughter . I like the fact that they have the UV spray on them so somebody runs away and tries to and cleans himself off you'll still be able to detect if it was him or not with UV light . It's great that you can just unclip it and take it off your keychain instead of having to try to get it off your keychain like other keychain pepper spray containers . It would be nice if they weren't all pink.
customer_reviews.author: 0ut5tash-TC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It is much better value to buy two as opposed to one. It has a breakaway tab so you can hook it on your purse and grab it when needed. The color makes it easy to find. I'm troubled that I live in a society where mother daughter pepper spray canisters are a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: M Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking animals or jogging.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for when she goes for her evening walks. She is just a tiny thing and she needs some kind of protection. This was a very easy purchase with the easy lock and use features. She has not had to use it thank god but it makes me feel better she has something just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty though.....
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet...... Thank God. But I'm hoping it's effective. Looks like the picture. Can't keep it in my purse because it looks as if it'll discharge accidentally. Can't keep it on my keys because I keep my keys in my purse. So I'm not sure if I'll even have it on hand if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and "nondeadly"
customer_reviews.text: I love the cuteness of it. I am a female cop and got these for loved ones. The 2 pack is 2 sprays in 1 package. I do wish it had 2 separate packaging and instructions but still will work. My friend and babysitter will love them. Idk how strong it is but hoping the same as what I carry.
customer_reviews.author: CaceyC

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This had to be used on 3 pit bulls that surrounded my husband while on a walk. One ended up with a red stained face and they all retreated. Best to have several of these sprays, since there isn't a lot of pepper spray in them.
customer_reviews.author: kitplanesue

customer_reviews.title: SMALL STREAM HARD TO USE
customer_reviews.text: Try as soon as you purchase any pepper spray device! This was hard to use and after a few try’s only a small amount streamed out. I don’t feel this would save me if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "HOT" pink in more ways than one
customer_reviews.text: Bright pink. Will not get lost in the darkness of your purse. This is pepper spray, not mace, which is fine with me. Not recommended for close contact, it could get you too, but with an arms length distance you should be fine. Key chain attachement included.
customer_reviews.author: CeeWaves

customer_reviews.title: Feel safer now that I have one.
customer_reviews.text: I feel a lot safer now that I have this! I don’t live in the best neighborhood and I’m always getting catcalled or followed which is why I purchased one of these. I love that there’s a quick release so I can easily get it off my keychain if I need to use it. I also like that there is an added safety feature so that it doesn’t accidentally go off or is used unless absolutely needed. Every female should have one of these. Very inexpensive for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Wyndi Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and color. The lock feature is ok, just seems easy to turn the notch to “open” so makes me a little worried when it’s moving around in my purse. But overall seems great. Hopefully it works if I need it but hoping I don’t need it. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sexy pink weapons
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spraying method, haven’t had to use it yet, but I had to test it out for practice sake. Love that it locks into place and doesn’t cause spills in my expensive bags, the attach and detachments are great for when it’s ready for use. The color is a sexy hot pink, I’m not gonna lie makes me feel tough when I have this ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Z1994

customer_reviews.title: I feel better already.
customer_reviews.text: After catching my ex boyfriend (a meth head) stalking me for the third time in two months...I decided to buy some protection. This is small, cute and practical! I also love the clip feature that allows you to detach from your keys for easier access. My only concern with this product is that the safety lock feature isn't child proof. I caught my five year and my roommates three year old playing with the lock. I will just have to keep a better eye on my keys which is a little inconvenient when you live with two toddlers. But oh well, my safety is more important.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Product
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Sabre Pepper Spray one other time, it was getting old so it was time to be replaced. Fortunately my wife has never had to use this, I've tested it out though for fun and it sprays with ease. The safety mechanism is great. It's secure and won't fire in her purse or while she's walking, but also easily armable to where she could use it quickly if need be. I've never had an issue with Sabre pepper spray leaking which is a must in my opinion. Overall, this is a great product and I'd highly recommend it to anyone who carries pepper spary.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to use safety
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I never needed to use this, so I can't speak on its spray. However it is very easy to hold, even in a pocket or other concealed location. The safety is simple but I never felt that I would accidentally set it off. I also like that it comes with the ability to be a keychain. I would buy this again and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Becker

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works just like most others, but, the top that you turn to the open and close, slides to easily back and forth, to where I’m not sure where the notch is. I do like the fact that it has 10 sprays in it. Works as it is told
customer_reviews.author: Kristal m.

customer_reviews.title: but I like it! It is a little bit bulky when ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chance to test this product out (and hopefully never will need to), but I like it! It is a little bit bulky when I put it on my lanyard and adds a bit of weight, but I'd rather deal with that than get attacked. My only complaint is that I wish it came with a retractable pull cord instead of the quick release, so I don't accidentally drop it or something.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: I feel more comfortable with it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought it for me and I really liked it. Perfect for when I'm running or just walking on trails. Some time sketchy people see it and they stay away. I bought and extra set for my mother in law and my sisters
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Furay

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and Get it
customer_reviews.text: The lock feature is not the best, but it is definitely not bad. Really easy to hold and use. I stored mine on my key-chain and its just fine. The pepper spray definitely works, my coworker tried it in the office and we all had to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Nerlyn

customer_reviews.title: It’s pink
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item , it came the very next day which was awesome . I read some of the reviews before purchasing so I decided to purchase . An am very pleased. It looks just like the picture displayed , I have not yet used it . Hopefully I never will need too . I purchased this after an incident scare happened while shopping in Walmart with my baby , However I feel a Little safer having this product now.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 2 & I feel safer with this & knowing my 76 yo mom has one too
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself & my mom. Like others states have to be careful with the little switch bc I have seen it out of place & pray it doesn’t accidentally spray me!!! But love the loud color & have other to my mom. Yes it makes your keys bulkier & heavier but it’s worth the safety.
customer_reviews.author: sandra r

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size Pepper Spray and Safe
customer_reviews.text: When I have bought pepper spray in the past, I am constantly worried I will always accidentally spray it. The safety feature on the item makes me feel secure and that I will never accidentally use it! The color is also really nice and makes it easy to find my keys. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Im ready..
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I haven't had the need to use this product. I did however, test the product to see if it works...not on me of course, but I did spray it on a willing participant which was a fun sight to see. Anyway, I verified that it worked for future emergencies, if needed. Its great that there's a safety lock because it does stay in my purse majority of the time. I wouldn't want this to be leaking all over my purse and belongings. That would be horrible. I saw this product at Academy for 20. Luckily I thought about shopping online. It saved me $10! Would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I havent used it on anyone but I take it with me on my runs and just kind of shove it in my pocket- it hasn't leaked or gone off so I'm happy. Also I practiced using it and its a nice straight line so I would re-purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel protected but doesn't look alarming on my keychain
customer_reviews.text: Really cute product and makes me feel safe when I walk alone at night. I like the bright color so if its in my hand while I'm walking it is easily visible to others. I feel like if I ever needed to use it that it would be relatively easy to release the tab- but hopefully I'll never have to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY RECALL NEEDED. NO LOCK ON MASE??
customer_reviews.text: This is A Major safety Issue and needs to be addressed before someone goes to hospital. Police strength pepper stay I purchased to give my wife to protect her and my 3 year old son. when I am working etc. When my wife showed me that there was no lock and no safety clip holding the trigger back from being switched over to the on position and being sprayed I was like whoa that's really bad I will contact AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Lock feature whack but it’s cute
customer_reviews.text: I Love the color! It looks like an adult toy though. I wish there was some kind of hook to keep the lock feature locked. Every time I check it, it is not locked. I don’t smell it but i Hope its not leaking or empty if I end up needing it
customer_reviews.author: Carkhris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry, but lock is lose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have for security. Luckily, I haven't had to use it yet and let's hope I never do. It fits on my key chain very well, it is very easy to hold, and I love the color. However, I have often times found that it unlocks itself just by being in my bag. That is scary to think that it could go off in my bag, because the lock is lose. Overall. its a decent product, But I was very disappointed with that
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gallimore

customer_reviews.title: COMES IN HANDY
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect! I’ve been wanting to buy some pepper sprays for awhile and I finally did. I sometimes feel unsafe shopping alone especially during the holidays because there’s more theft and I live near Dallas, tx and it’s the 2nd highest in human trafficking. The other day I was at Walmart shopping alone and this crazy lady started following me asking for money even tho I repeatedly said no and tried to get away from her. Eventually I got to an employee and the crazy lady ran off when I pointed at her. Better safe than sorry! I can carry this / especially when I go to college too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It has at least 25 bursts in it...so worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device to carry especially when you are alone. It is easy to lock and unlock. Thy even have a 5 minute video you can watch to make sure you are prepared if you ever have to deploy it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Morado

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The safety lock is easily moved so can go off in purse or pocket easily. None of them tho are good with locks.
customer_reviews.author: Puishe

customer_reviews.title: Yup!
customer_reviews.text: One of those gifts I gave to all the women, in my life, that I hope they never use.... They all have it on their keychains, and tho, not small, they do go in their purse without problem. Thankfully, we haven't had a need to use them, but I'm sure they'll do the trick, and put a bad guy down!
customer_reviews.author: Capo2

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had to actually use this product and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to actually use this product and I hope I never have to. However, it appears to be as described. I keep it in my car and within reach. One thing to keep in mind, IF you have to use it, do NOT use it in your car. Get out of the car, spray AWAY from your car, and get back in and drive away. You do not want to spray IN your car as that will make it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Ann

customer_reviews.title: Gift of self-defense for a co-worker
customer_reviews.text: One of my co-workers started getting creepy phone calls from one of our customers, and since she sometimes gets off late at night, I wanted her to have a good way to defend herself if she needs to. I've carried this brand of pepper spray for years and never had a problem with it, so naturally it's the one I chose to give her as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Island GirlTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great besides lock feature
customer_reviews.text: I liked this. It’s cute, attaches to key chain easily, but the lock feature is questionable. I find that I’ll look at my spray sometimes and it is unlocked and had I pressed down on it would have sprayed myself or it would’ve sprayed something else. The lock slides super easily so that’s not great but it makes me feel safe.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Bramley

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, Bought as a gift and so never used myself !
customer_reviews.text: I have seen some of my friends carry this for personal safety. So I bought it for my cousin. The build quality is very good. But neither me nor my cousin has got chance to use it. But it looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Anik Tahabilder (WCU)

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute must have for any loved one
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times for all the female's in my family and friends. I believe this is a necessity for an individual to carry around for self protection! I first got this for my mom who walked the back roads around her house for exercise late at night. I was constantly worried about her safety knowing how dangerous things can be during this day in age. It took a lot off of my mind knowing she would have some easy form of self protection against attackers both human and animal. Great gift for any occasion. Very potent, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B Coffman

customer_reviews.title: The case broke and canister fell out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and it broke. The case around the actual canister broke and it fell out wihtout her noticing. The locking mechanism kept opening itself after a while. Other than that, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo O.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Have never had to use this thank goodness but it seems very easy to use. I love the lock and the safety features so that I don’t accidentally spray myself. This looks so cute on a keychain, I carry it with me everywhere I go along with my keys and wallet and it doesn’t look that bad since it’s so small and it’s pink
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: The original was a gift and I found it useful to run with as it clipped on to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older model that I had for four years and had expired. The original was a gift and I found it useful to run with as it clipped on to my shorts. This model has no clip, which I wish it did. I have thankfully never had to use it so I can't speak to that aspect but it is probably not a bad investment for those who know how to use it. Like any defense mechanism it should be understood and can be used against you so I would suggest testing it and reading the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: JGMD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago and really enjoy how portable it is! I personally have it in my purse most of the time, but if I leave the house with just my phone and keys, I clip it on either my key ring or the belt loops on my pants. It’s the perfect size and doesn’t feel too bulky. I’ll definitely repurchase when it expires :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Veronica Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Good price on the two pack, safety mechanism seems weak
customer_reviews.text: Great price on this two pack. Haven’t done a test deploy yet but the only negative thing I can say is the safety mechanism to keep it from deploying accidentally seems a bit loose. I am concerned of it deploying accidentally so I keep it in a seperate section in my bag. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Helpful?
customer_reviews.text: Other than spraying this at someone, there is not a way to determine if the product works. If I ever need it, I will find out then. I was disappointed to find the color is very bright. It is brighter than hot pink. It is basically like carrying a sign stating “I have pepper spray”. It is not what I want.
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful and is the perfect gift for any woman. I use mine for self defense, I'm very uncomfortable walking by myself because my state (Ohio) is the worst place for sex trafficking in the entire country. This is a perfect way to escape any bad situations! DO NOT HESITATE TO USE IT!!! It's there to help protect you
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Aiyala

customer_reviews.title: Well Thought Out Design
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one for carrying weapons, but bought this as a young woman, who recently moved to a big city. I feel a lot safer having this on my person. It's larger than I thought it would be, so I'm really glad it has the quick release clip. I mostly clip it on if I'm going for extended walks by myself or taking public transit, otherwise, it's a little bulky. I'm glad it has a safety clip, so it doesn't accidentally leak in my bag. It shoots pretty far, as advertised. Overall, I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ross

customer_reviews.title: Daughters Are Feeling Safer
customer_reviews.text: Got a double pack for have one for both of my teen daughters. Arrived timely just as described—light weight yet sturdy, easy to detach and use quickly, and very well constructed to avoid accidental discharge. Very wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ADavis

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived as expected...I luckily haven't had to test it out on anyone (hopefully, I never will), so I can't speak to whether it actually works. However, I like finger grips, and the attachment that allows you to easily connect it to or remove it from your keys.
customer_reviews.author: JRose

customer_reviews.title: Common Sense
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet and hopefully will never have to! Just make sure you don't use it as a joke, try it out on someone, or on accident because unless you are using it for self defense then it is a felony! I like the size and color. Also, it will not work on bears people, they make a special spray for wildlife, just in case you were thinking of buying it for a camping trip. It will work on any new hiking partner you barely know that tries to violate you(unfortunately this has happened to many foolish women). Please, everyone use your common sense so you never have to use it either!
customer_reviews.author: Athena2419

customer_reviews.title: The Ladies loved it. It's nice and small and doesn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a couple of these as gifts for mothers day. The Ladies loved it. It's nice and small and doesn't take up a ton of room. Everyone loved the design and feels a little more safer now. Who doesn't want that. It's pretty simple but still make sure to read the instructions, it won't work if you don't know how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Nachos

customer_reviews.title: Deploy for self defense only.  This is not a toy.  Practice ear to ear mock spays at a mininum.  Create distance to stay safer.
customer_reviews.text: A great product at a great price. Deploy for self defense only, for my daughters. This Is Not A Toy! Like all defensive products without practice there's no reason to have one. With practice (and not even spraying ear to ear) you have a better chance of gaining distance under stress.
customer_reviews.author: Jim_USATop Contributor: Camping

product_meta.title: SABRE RED Pink Pepper Spray Keychain for Women with Quick Release for Easy Access – Maximum Police Strength, Finger Grip for Aim & Accuracy, 10-Foot (3M) Range, 25 Bursts – Helps Fight Breast Cancer
product_meta.description: About This Pepper Spray This hot pink pepper spray features a hard case and our reinforced trigger twist lock to prevent accidental discharge. Included in the packaging is SABRE’s Quick Release Key Ring which provides easy access to spray, whether attached to your purse, backpack or keys in a locked door. Why SABRE? Maximum stopping power - SABRE Red is the most popular formulation carried by law enforcement Reduces wind blowback - Powerful Stream Delivery Protection against multiple threats - 25 Bursts (up to 5x more than other brands) Protection at a safe distance - 10-foot (3M) Range Supporting Breast Cancer Awareness When you purchase the HC-NBCF-01 or HC-NBCF-04, you directly support the National Breast Cancer Foundation. Since 2008, SABRE has donated over $1.7 million, helping to support 1.1 Million in navigation services and over 293, 000 screening & diagnostic service. Safety You Can Trust Backed by more than 40 years of experience manufacturing pepper spray, SABRE is trusted by thousands of police departments and consumers worldwide. Family owned and operated for four decades, our pepper spray is proudly manufactured in the U.S.A. and ISO 9001: 2008 certified.
feature_bullets: #1 PEPPER SPRAY BRAND TRUSTED BY POLICE AND CONSUMERS WORLDWIDE: Including New York PD, Chicago PD & U.S. Marshals; RELIABLE & LONG-LASTING: 4-year shelf life from date of manufacture (2X the industry standard) for the best self-protection available

GUARANTEED MAXIMUM STRENGTH: SABRE's professional-grade OC Spray is backed by our in-house HPLC lab testing, guaranteeing maximum heat and stopping power in every burst and eliminating the 30% failure rate of other pepper spray brands (U of Utah study)

FASTER, EASIER, MORE ACCURATE: Finger grip enhances your grasp, your aim and helps keep your eye on the threat; Includes Quick Release Key Ring for immediate access when seconds count; Reinforced Twist Lock prevents accidental discharge for safe storage

STAY SABRE SAFE WITH FREE TRAINING: Packaging includes links to free training videos - so that, in the face of danger, you are equipped with industry leading pepper spray and the knowledge needed to maximize your personal safety; Made in the U.S.A.

PROTECTION THAT SUPPORTS CHARITY: ½ oz can w/ 25 bursts (5x other brands) in powerful stream delivery, projects 10-feet & reduces wind blowback; UV marking dye helps ID suspect; Proceeds benefit National Breast Cancer Foundation w/ $1.8M donated to-date

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
